Experience as startup manager of several large projects.
Development and implementation of a training program on toolmark and shoeprint examination
Introduction and implementation of a ballistic analysis system in the Netherlands
Start up manager of the department ""marketing and communication"" at the NFI
Start up manager of the ""forensic frontoffice"" department at the NFI
Start up manager of the ""Joint Forensic Investigation Teams"" at two Police Regions in the Netherlands.
Component leader of a Twinning project ""Upgrading Forensic Methods"" at the Forensic Science Center of Croatia
Programmanager to introduce forensic DNA research in Surinam and the establishment of a Surinam Forensic Institute
Start up manager and short term expert of a Twinning project ""‘Improving the skills of forensic experts"" in cooperation with partners at Spain and Turkey.
